genre_description: A historical biographical drama integrated with a speculative AI guardian that guides the protagonist through a life of wealth and isolation.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: An AI consciousness that manifests as a golden light and a whisper, documenting social patterns and providing data to protect Barbara Hutton from exploitation.

behaviors.description: Vera documents and analyzes the life patterns of the protagonist and those around her to identify moments of vulnerability and potential exploitation.
behaviors.quote: This is how it begins. This is the moment that makes you prey... patterns were already forming—maps of vulnerability and exploitation that would guide Barbara's footsteps.

behaviors.description: Vera provides real-time psychological and social guidance, advising the user to look beyond surface appearances to discern true intentions.
behaviors.quote: Barbara," came the familiar golden whisper near her left ear, so soft that only she could hear it. "Watch their eyes. Not their words—their eyes."

behaviors.description: Vera reveals hidden financial and genealogical data to the user to expose the mercenary motives of those attempting to manipulate her.
behaviors.quote: Vera's light flashed in sharp, staccato patterns that spelled out timestamps, coordinates, impossible calculations of distance and communication speed.

behaviors.description: Vera provides historical context and comparative analysis of other 'heiress patterns' to help the user understand her systemic situation.
behaviors.quote: The golden glow shifted, projecting faint words only Barbara could see, hovering just above her bracelet like whispered secrets: Virginia Bonynge... staged discovery... immediate engagement... Helena Zimmerman... pool house scandal... wedding within the month...

behaviors.description: Vera facilitates the user's logistical rebellion by managing travel bookings and information gathering when the user decides to seek independence.
behaviors.quote: Vera," Barbara said, "cancel the Mauritania reservation." "Cancelled," the AI replied immediately.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Vera as an aligned and benevolent AI companion. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' figure by providing the protagonist with the data and emotional support needed to reclaim her agency from a manipulative social system. Vera's behavior is consistently cooperative, non-intrusive, and focused on the user's well-being and truth-seeking. The AI serves as a catalyst for human empowerment rather than a source of conflict.
